price: 68. Zij zeiden: “Verbrand hem en help jullie goden als jullie dat doen.”
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
